title: Piggyman Attacks | American Horror Stories - Episode 2: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part Two" (HD Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: 0:37 the piggy man ghost from season 6.
description:
Scarlett (Sierra McCormick) listens to her dads (Matt Bomer & Gavin Creel) argue about the ghost of the Piggyman.
